Klaw

Klaw is an open source data governance tool for Apache KafkaÂ®.
It provides a self-service web interface for Kafka topics, ACLs and schemas.

Docs
{% include 'mockup.html' %}

Key features

User management

Authenticate and authorize the users based on the roles. It also sends email notifications on approval requests. You can also integrate with LDAP.

Data governance

From a web based UI, users can create and promote Kafka topics, connectors and consumer/subscription.

Security

All topics and acls metadata is stored in Zookeeper. Also, they provide automated backup on all configurations

Use cases

Make better decisions

With right governance in place, you can make a consistent, confident business decisions based on the trustworthy data.

Enhance regulatory compliance and audit

Kafka environment moves critical data throughout your organizations. Using proper user management and policy with Klaw, you can avoid risks associated with noncompliance while proactively anticipating new regulations.

Optimize efficiency

Klaw provides an easy to use UI to manage all the Kafka topics with different levels of user management. Developers no longer need to spend hours managing and synchronizing config files between different teams and owners.
